title: TTMM to Wear watch face #1
summary: TTMM to Wear #1 - designer watch faces collection
description: TTMM#1 is a designer watchface colection for Android Wear smartwatches. You will find here pack of 4 original watchfaces: 3TTMM, 9TTMM, TOOTTMM and TTMMINUS. 9TTMM is golden A' Design Award Winner in Interface and Interaction Design Category. All models have 9 colors customization and work in ambient mode. I hope this collection shows different point of view on a time. Have a great TTMM.Compatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3Design : Albert SalamonProgramming : Michał Żyliński© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
descriptionHTML:
TTMM#1 is a designer watchface colection for Android Wear smartwatches. You will find here pack of 4 original watchfaces: 3TTMM, 9TTMM, TOOTTMM and TTMMINUS. 9TTMM is golden A' Design Award Winner in Interface and Interaction Design Category. All models have 9 colors customization and work in ambient mode. I hope this collection shows different point of view on a time. Have a great TTMM.

Compatible with Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch 3

Design : Albert Salamon
Programming : Michał Żyliński

© 2015 COPYRIGHT Albert Salamon
comments: Brilliant. Very well designed simple watch faces at great value. Totally refreshing compared to the rest and what I've been waiting for.                   One request: Any chance in transitioning colours, alternating throughout day/ breathing effects?
Needs some improvements The watch faces are nice, but there seems to be no way to change the colours on watch or phone. Also 9TTMM just shows a black face when screen is dimmed.
Different from the rest Gorgeous watch faces and they really stand out. 4 watch faces for 35 cents each is a steal anyway. Very pleased. Keep up the great art-work.
Watch faces look great, but I am unable to modify any of the settings in any of the watch faces :(
